ComicInfo.Summary: October, 1944. Nazi fortunes appear bleaker by the day as the Allied noose around Germany tightens during the waning days of World War II. But in the bowels of the Wenceslas Mines, a terrible threat has emerged... The Nazis have discovered the ability to conquer time itself with the help of a new ominous device! Now a rag tag group of American GIs must stop this threat to the past, present, and future... While dealing with their past, prejudices, and fears in the process. THIS ISSUE: With little time to grieve for one of their fallen comrades, the Grunts enter the secret Nazi base, only to find more questions than answers! Who is this mysterious jailed woman, claiming to be from the future? Is she friend or foe?!? Meanwhile, the Nazis rev up their time machines... For a strategic assault on the past!"
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-05-27 18:00:50. [CVDB672383]
ComicInfo.Penciller: Alex Sanchez, Patrick Thomas Parnell, Alex Sanchez, Patrick Thomas Parnell
ComicInfo.Inker: Alex Sanchez, Patrick Thomas Parnell, Alex Sanchez, Patrick Thomas Parnell
